security_audit.summary: All 442 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The 'weak cryptographic algorithm' detections (268 instances) are dictionary bracket access patterns mistaken for crypto operations. The 'backtick execution' detections (163 instances in markdown) are code formatting delimiters, not shell commands. 'System reconnaissance' findings (15 instances) are legitimate Claude configuration path references. 'Hidden file access' findings are standard documentation of configuration paths. No malicious code, network calls, file system manipulation, or credential access exists. The skill is purely algorithmic text processing for app store marketing.

content.value_statement: This skill helps app developers research keywords, optimize metadata, analyze competitors, and track app performance on Apple App Store and Google Play Store. It provides actionable recommendations to improve app visibility and download conversions.
actual_capabilities: Research keywords with search volume and competition analysis
Optimize app titles, descriptions, and keyword fields for both Apple and Google
Analyze competitor ASO strategies and identify market gaps
Calculate ASO health scores with prioritized improvement recommendations
Plan and analyze A/B tests for icons, screenshots, and metadata
Generate pre-launch checklists for app store submission
limitations: Does not provide actual search volume data from Apple or Google
Does not access app store APIs for real-time competitor data
Does not include paid user acquisition strategies like Apple Search Ads
Does not handle app submission technical requirements like certificates

use_cases.title: Research keywords for launch
use_cases.description: Research high-value keywords with good search volume but manageable competition for your app category.

use_cases.title: Optimize store listings
use_cases.description: Create optimized metadata with character limit validation for both Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

use_cases.title: Track ASO performance
use_cases.description: Calculate ASO health scores and identify priority improvements based on ratings, keywords, and conversion metrics.

prompt_templates.title: Keyword research
prompt_templates.scenario: Research keywords for a new app
prompt_templates.prompt: Research the best keywords for my [category] app targeting [audience]. Include competition analysis and long-tail opportunities.

prompt_templates.title: Optimize metadata
prompt_templates.prompt: Optimize my app metadata for the [platform] store. App: [name], features: [list], target keywords: [list]. Include character count validation.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze competitors
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze the ASO strategies of [competitor1], [competitor2], and [competitor3]. Identify gaps and opportunities.

prompt_templates.title: Plan A/B test
prompt_templates.prompt: Design an A/B test for my [element]. Current conversion rate is [rate]%. Calculate required sample size and test duration.

output_examples.input: Research keywords for a productivity app
output: Recommended keywords: 'task manager' (high volume, medium competition), 'productivity tool' (medium volume, low competition)
Long-tail opportunities: 'task manager with reminders', 'daily task planner app'
Keyword density analysis: current metadata underutilizes 'productivity' keyword
Breakdown: Metadata Quality 18/25, Ratings 15/25, Keywords 12/25, Conversion 23/25
Top improvement: Add 2 more keywords to top 50 rankings
Secondary improvement: Increase review response rate
Top 3 competitors identified in Productivity category
All competitors use brand + keyword in title format
Gap found: None are targeting 'AI productivity' keyword
Recommendation: Target 'AI task manager' for differentiation

best_practices: Front-load important keywords in the app title for maximum visibility
Balance high-volume keywords with achievable long-tail opportunities
Update metadata with each major app release to maintain freshness
anti_patterns: Using keywords that do not accurately describe your app functionality
Ignoring platform-specific character limits and requirements
Focusing only on rankings without considering conversion optimization

faq.question: How often should I update my app keywords?
faq.answer: Review and update keywords quarterly or with each major app release to capture trending searches.

faq.question: What is the ideal keyword density?
faq.answer: Aim for 3-5% keyword density in descriptions. Avoid keyword stuffing which can hurt rankings.

faq.question: How long does Google take to index metadata changes?
faq.answer: Google Play typically indexes changes within 1-2 hours. Apple may take 24-48 hours.

faq.question: How many keywords should I target?
faq.answer: Focus on 5-10 high-value primary keywords. Apple's 100-character field allows 100 characters total.

faq.question: Does ASO work the same for games and utility apps?
faq.answer: No, benchmarks and competition levels vary significantly by category. Games have higher competition.

faq.question: Can I use the same keywords on both Apple and Google?
faq.answer: While possible, optimize separately as each platform has different algorithms and character limits.
